title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park        A troop of Boy Scouts celebrate their volunteer experience on top of Lassen Peak. NPS Photo   Â      Visitors select postcards at the Kohm Yah-mah-nee Visitor Center bookstore NPS Photo  Volunteer Volunteers are important members of the Lassen Volcanic National Park team. Support your park by giving the gift of your time and expertise for a day, a week, or longer. Read more about volunteer opportunities at Lassen.   Artist-in-Residence Program Capture that which inspires you at Lassen Volcanic National Park through the new Artist-in-Residence (AIR) Program. Each year an artist will be selected for a residency of up to four weeks. Learn more or apply here.   Donate Visitor donations provide crucial financial support for special projects, interpretive services, and visitor experience improvement. You may donate to the park directly or through one of the park's partners including the Lassen Park Foundation and the Lassen Association. Educational Bookstore purchases You can also support your park through learning. Items purchased from the Lassen Association educational bookstores make great educational souvenirs for you and all profits from sales going directly to the park.
